## serialization.workspaces.load() function

Loads the variable represented by the given state into the given workspace.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function load(state: {
    [key: string]: any;
}, workspace: Workspace, { recordUndo }?: {
    recordUndo?: boolean;
}): void;
```
